name: FCHR
purpose: This function will return the first displayable (non-space) character in an A type field or the position value of that character.

parts.description: The field to be checked. Must be an A type field.
If ‘C’ the function will return the character; if ‘L’ the location of the first character.

return_type: A If ‘C’ the function returns a single A type character. I If ‘L’ the function returns an I type value.
